Amy Likes Spiders

27 February 2023


Amy told me she likes spiders.
She has even shown me one of them.
Icky, wriggly, hairy, ugly spiders!
But I’m still friends with her.

Amy never told anyone about her spiders.
She only wanted me to know this.
I don’t really get why she likes them.
But I’m still friends with her.

Amy has a lot of friends.
She can’t talk to them about her spiders.
She’s afraid they will not like that.
But I’m still friends with her.

She has other hobbies we can both enjoy.
She keeps this one private.
This one doesn’t hurt anyone.

I know she trusts me.
Her trust means a lot to me.
My world is better with her in it.

And I’m not gonna tell anyone.
